item.tconstruct.flint_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with high knockback
item.tconstruct.earth_slime_sling.toolti:
Натяните, прицельтесь пониже, и отпустите!
Используйте слизневые ботинки, если вам дорога жизнь!
item.tconstruct.sky_slime_sling.tooltip:
Charge up, let go, get back in the air!
Use Slime Boots if you value your life!
item.tconstruct.ender_slime_sling.toolti: Charge up, point it at a wall, come out the other side!
item.tconstruct.ichor_slime_sling.toolti: Натяните, направьте на существо и отправьте его в полёт!
item.tconstruct.piggy_backpack.tooltip: Используйте на мобе, чтобы забрать его
block.tconstruct.cast_chest.tooltip: Вмещает всех необходимые формы для отливок
item.tconstruct.pickaxe.description:
The Pickaxe is a precise mining tool. It is effective on stone and ores.
It breaks blocks, OK?
item.tconstruct.sledge_hammer.descriptio:
The Sledge Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests blocks in a wide range.
Also effective against undead.
item.tconstruct.vein_hammer.description: The Vein Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests many connected blocks of the same type, perfect for ores.
item.tconstruct.mattock.description:
The Cutter Mattock is a versatile farming tool. It is effective on wood, dirt, sand, gravel, and plants.
Just don't dig your own grave!
item.tconstruct.excavator.description:
The Excavator is a broad digging tool. It digs up large areas of soil and snow in a wide range.
Terraforming!
item.tconstruct.hand_axe.description:
The Hand Axe chops up wood and makes short work of leaves. It also makes for an effective weapon.
Chop chop!
item.tconstruct.broad_axe.description:
The Broad Axe fells small trees in a single swing, and makes quick work of large trees. It makes for a powerful heavy weapon.
Timber!
item.tconstruct.kama.description:
The Kama is a precision reaping tool, mowing down plants and shearing animals.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.scythe.description:
The Scythe is a broad reaping tool, mowing down plants in a wide area.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.dagger.description: The Dagger is a light weapon, capabile of quick strikes from either hand.
item.tconstruct.sword.description:
The Sword is a universal weapon. Sweep attacks keep enemy hordes at bay.
Also good against cobwebs!
item.tconstruct.cleaver.description: The Cleaver is a weapon for a smeltery master. High range attacks keep cut though the toughest of foes.
death.attack.tconstruct.smeltery_magic: %1$s has become one with the smeltery

block.tconstruct.sky_slime_sapling.toolt: Only grows on slimy dirt or grass
block.tconstruct.ender_slime_sapling.too: Only grows on slimy dirt or grass
material.tconstruct.wood.flavor: Сколько дров мог бы наколоть сурок, если бы сурок мог колоть дрова?
material.tconstruct.wood.encyclopedia: Повышает эффективность починок на 50% за каждую детать
material.tconstruct.stone.encyclopedia: Заставляет инструмент добывать быстрее со скоростью квадратного корня, вычисляемого из потерянной прочности
material.tconstruct.flint.encyclopedia: Увеличивает урон на 1/4 квадратного корня, вычисляемого из потерянной прочности
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.flavor: Вы хотите свести счёты со мной?
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.encycl: Исцеляет до 5% нанесенного урона за уровень
material.tconstruct.iron.flavor: Забавно. Он мог спасать других от смерти, а себя не сумел...
material.tconstruct.iron.encyclopedia: Увеличивает прочность на 10% за каждую дополнительную часть
material.tconstruct.seared_stone.encyclo: Даёт +2.5 урона за уровень в жарких биомах, и -2.5 в холодных
material.tconstruct.scorched_stone.encyc: Дает +2 урона за уровень против горящих целей
material.tconstruct.copper.flavor: Не позволяйте ей испортиртить ваш день.
material.tconstruct.copper.encyclopedia: Увеличивает скорость добычи на низкой глубине, до +10% за уровень
material.tconstruct.slimewood.flavor: Это древесина из слизи или слизь, которая была наполнена деревом?
material.tconstruct.slimewood.encycloped: Даёт 5% шанс сгенерировать избыточную слизь каждую секунду
material.tconstruct.bloodbone.flavor: Разве кровь не должна быть внутри кости?
material.tconstruct.bloodbone.encycloped: Увеличивает урон при низком уровне здоровья, до +4 урона за уровень на 1 сердце
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.flavor: Оговорка: на самом деле делается не из роз.
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.encycloped: Добавляет 1 слот для улучшений за каждую часть
material.tconstruct.slimesteel.encyclope: Grants 25 extra overslime, +50% of the total per level
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.flavor: Это не обсидиановая деталь, если бы это было так, на ней было бы написано"Обсидиан."
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.encyclopedia: Has a 50% chance of doing up to 5 damage over time, more damage at higher levels
material.tconstruct.tinkers_bronze.encyc: Grants +10% to +15% mining speed per level at full durability, based on other modifiers
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.encyclopedi: Can be eaten to restore 1 hunger and 0.1 saturation per level
material.tconstruct.cobalt.flavor: Coblat. The material of the Red Army.
material.tconstruct.cobalt.encyclopedia: Boosts mining and attack speed by 7% per level
material.tconstruct.manyullyn.flavor: The metal that most Tinkers will never pronounce right. Also known as a star cutting material.
material.tconstruct.manyullyn.encycloped: Grants +2 damage per level after 8 consecutive hits
material.tconstruct.hepatizon.flavor: He-pa-ti-zon - boil it, mash it, put it in a stew.
material.tconstruct.hepatizon.encycloped: Boosts mining speed by 25% per level after mining 32 consecutive blocks
material.tconstruct.queens_slime.flavor: Princesses are evil, get yourself a Queen.
material.tconstruct.queens_slime.encyclo: Reduces durability by 15% per level, 66% of that going towards overslime
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.flavor: Harness the full power of the Nether Fortress - bone and blaze
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.encyclo: Grants +1% damage per second of fire, up to +15% from lava's 15 seconds. Bonus reduced by fire resistance.
material.tconstruct.lead.flavor: Could try and make a sandwhich out of this.
material.tconstruct.lead.encyclopedia: Grants +10% attack and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.silver.flavor: You know, this tool isn't going to look so shiny in a few days.
material.tconstruct.silver.encyclopedia: Gives +2.5 damage against undead per level
material.tconstruct.electrum.encyclopedi: Grants +50% XP per level from blocks and monsters
material.tconstruct.bronze.flavor: Not to be confused with Tinker's Bronze.
material.tconstruct.bronze.encyclopedia: Grants +12.5% mining speed per level at full durability
material.tconstruct.steel.encyclopedia: Grants +4% durability, damage, and speed per level
material.tconstruct.constantan.flavor: Constantantantantantantan... Sorry it's fun to add more "tans."
material.tconstruct.constantan.encyclope: Grants +12.5% mining speed in extreme heat or cold
modifier.tconstruct.empty.description: Fallback for when a modifier is missing
modifier.tconstruct.shiny.description: Tool glows with an enchanted glint
modifier.tconstruct.offhanded.flavor: Dont think about it too hard
modifier.tconstruct.offhanded.descriptio: Disables the tools interaction abilities when the offhand is filled
modifier.tconstruct.overforced.descripti: Tool is reinforced using slime, allowing more capacity for overslime
modifier.tconstruct.emerald.description: Увеличивает прочность инструмента в зависимости от исходной прочности! Зловреды ненавидят это!
modifier.tconstruct.worldbound.descripti: Грубая версия незерита, дающая иммунитет к внешним повреждениям, таким как огонь, но без увеличения силы.
modifier.tconstruct.soulbound.descriptio: Инструмент остаётся в инвентаре после смерти!
modifier.tconstruct.netherite.descriptio: Используйте силу древнего металла, сделав инструмент более прочным и невосприимчивым к внешним повреждениям, таким как огонь
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.netherite_req: Для наложения незерита необходим алмаз или изумруд
modifier.tconstruct.overslime.descriptio: Tool consumes overslime instead of durability, until it runs out! Not friendly towards tools lacking slime
modifier.tconstruct.experienced.descript: Gain bonus XP from killing mobs and mining blocks
modifier.tconstruct.haste.description: Magic red dust makes tool swing and mine faster!
modifier.tconstruct.blasting.description: Your tool breaks blocks weak to explosions, such as ores, faster!
modifier.tconstruct.hydraulic.descriptio: Tool mines faster underwater or in the rain!
modifier.tconstruct.lightspeed.descripti: Tool mines well lit blocks faster!
modifier.tconstruct.knockback.descriptio: Hitting things makes them go flying further!
modifier.tconstruct.padded.description: Reduces the knockback of the tool, to stop your enemies from escaping
modifier.tconstruct.severing.flavor: Не только головы, но и ноги, и перья!
modifier.tconstruct.severing.description: Отрезает головы или другие части мобов, если это возможно!
modifier.tconstruct.fiery.flavor: Infused with the fires of hell!
modifier.tconstruct.necrotic.description: Hitting enemies drains their life to heal you
modifier.tconstruct.piercing.description: Tool deals bonus damage which attacks through armor!
modifier.tconstruct.smite.description: Undead fear the might of the melon!
modifier.tconstruct.bane_of_sssss.flavor: That'sss a nice ssspider you have there!
modifier.tconstruct.bane_of_sssss.descri: Tool does bonus damage against spiders, creepers and other creepey crawly hissing things!
modifier.tconstruct.antiaquatic.descript: Tool does bonus damage to sea creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.cooling.description: Tool does bonus damage to fire based creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.sweeping_edge.descri: Targets of sweep attack take a larger percentage of this tool's damage
modifier.tconstruct.sharpness.descriptio: Tool is so much sharper, dealing more damage!
modifier.tconstruct.unbreakable.descript: Tool no longer takes damage from normal usage
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.unbreakable_r: Unbreakable requires Netherite and Reinforced V to apply
modifier.tconstruct.dual_wielding.descri: Can attack from the offhand, provided the main hand can also dual wield. Tools with dual wielding have reduced stats
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.two_handed_du: Two handed tools require Offhanded to gain dual wielding.
modifier.tconstruct.silky.description: Mined blocks drop themselves instead of the usual items
modifier.tconstruct.autosmelt.flavor: Fires of the Nether in your tool!
modifier.tconstruct.luck.description: Gives you more nice things when mining or killing mobs!
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.luck.level_2: Luckier requires a different recipe for the first level
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.luck.level_3: Luckiest requires a different recipe for the first two levels
modifier.tconstruct.fortune.description: Gives you more nice things when mining!
modifier.tconstruct.looting.description: Gives you more nice things when killing mobs!
modifier.tconstruct.expanded.description: Tool's area of effect is larger than before
modifier.tconstruct.reach.description: Can reach further blocks and mobs while holding this tool!
modifier.tconstruct.pathing.flavor: Where we're going, we need roads!
modifier.tconstruct.stripping.descriptio: Tool can strip bark from wood
modifier.tconstruct.glowing.description: Tool can place glow balls, consuming durability
modifier.tconstruct.exchanging.descripti: Blocks broken by this tool are replaced by the block in the offhand if possible
modifier.tconstruct.firestarter.descript: Tool can create fire on usage
modifier.tconstruct.fireprimer.descripti: Increases the area of fire of the tool
modifier.tconstruct.melting.description: Расплавляет атакованных существ и выпавшие предметы!
modifier.tconstruct.tank.description: Инструмент имеет резервуар, позволяющий хранить жидкость
modifier.tconstruct.bucketing.descriptio: Tool can pickup liquid, or place it when crouching
modifier.tconstruct.writable.description: More words. More upgrade. It's only logical!
modifier.tconstruct.harmonious.descripti: Allows an additional upgrade to live in harmony with the rest!
modifier.tconstruct.recapitated.descript: Sets this tool ahead by one upgrade!
modifier.tconstruct.resurrected.descript: Respawns one of this tool's upgrade slots!
modifier.tconstruct.gilded.description: Trades an ability slot for two upgrade slots!
modifier.tconstruct.draconic.description: The head of the great beast allows your tool a second ability slot!
__comment: Three more +1 upgrade modifiers for modpacks
modifier.tconstruct.red_extra_upgrade.de: Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
modifier.tconstruct.blue_extra_upgrade.d: Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
modifier.tconstruct.extra_ability.descri: Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
modifier.tconstruct.cultivated.descripti: Tool practically grows more material when repairing
modifier.tconstruct.jagged.description: Every point durability lost increases damage, but decreases mining speed
modifier.tconstruct.stonebound.descripti: The tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage
modifier.tconstruct.fractured.descriptio: Tool is extra sharp due to the broken bits of bone
modifier.tconstruct.searing.description: Tool does bonus damage in hot areas, but less damage in cold ones
modifier.tconstruct.scorching.descriptio: Tool does bonus damage to targets that are on fire
modifier.tconstruct.dwarven.description: Tool mines faster the deeper you mine, just don't mine too deep
modifier.tconstruct.raging.description: Tool does more damage when the holder's health is low
modifier.tconstruct.enhanced.description: Rose gold goes great with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.tconstruct.overcast.description: Overslime can be made extra thick on this tool
modifier.tconstruct.lacerating.descripti: Causes the target to bleed, dealing additional damage
modifier.tconstruct.maintained.descripti: Tool mines faster when at higher durability
modifier.tconstruct.lightweight.descript: Tool is incredibly light for its size, allowing you to attack and mine faster
modifier.tconstruct.tasty.description: Smells so good, you cannot resist taking a few bites of your tool
death.attack.tconstruct.bleed.item: %1$s bled to death from injuries caused by %2$s
modifier.tconstruct.overlord.description: Tool takes some of the durability as new overslime subjects
modifier.tconstruct.momentum.flavor: Not Fast Enough, Gotta Go Faster!
modifier.tconstruct.momentum.description: Mining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going
modifier.tconstruct.insatiable.descripti: During combat you deal more and more damage every time you hit an enemy
modifier.tconstruct.conducting.descripti: Tool deals multiplied damage when you are on fire
modifier.tconstruct.heavy.description: Hard to move while wielding, but it packs a heavy punch
modifier.tconstruct.holy.description: Let the undead fall to the might of your blade
modifier.tconstruct.ductile.description: Tool is longer lasting, mines faster, and damages more
modifier.tconstruct.maintained_2.descrip: Tool mines faster when at higher durability
modifier.tconstruct.temperate.descriptio: Tool mines faster when in extreme temperatures
tool_stat.tconstruct.attack_speed.descri:
Base value for attack speed calculations.
Roughly full strength attacks per second.
tool_stat.tconstruct.durability.descript:
The base-value for durability calculations.
Usually an integral part to the overall durability of a tool.
stat.tconstruct.head: Головка
tool_stat.tconstruct.mining_speed.descri:
How fast a tool with a tool head of this material can mine blocks.
May be influenced by other toolparts.
tool_stat.tconstruct.harvest_level.descr: What range of blocks a tool with a tool head of this material can mine.
tool_stat.tconstruct.attack_damage.descr:
Base value for attack calculations.
The end result depends on the tool itself and the other components used.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.durability.d: The total durability of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.attack_damag: The total attack damage of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.attack_speed: The total attack speed of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.mining_speed: The total mining speed of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tooltip.tconstruct.part.missing_stats:
Material is missing the required stats:
{0}
gui.tconstruct.crafting_station.uncrafta: Этот предмет в настоящее время не может быть создан игроком.
gui.tconstruct.part_builder.info:
Here you can craft tool parts to fulfill your tinkering fantasies.

To craft a part simply put a blank pattern into the left slot and select the part you want. The remaining slot holds the material you want to craft your part out of.
Material cannot be shaped in the part builder. Other methods such as casting are required.
gui.tconstruct.tinker_station.info: The main way to repair or change your tools. Place a tool and a material on the left to get started.
recipe.tconstruct.overslime.at_capacity: Tool has no more space for overslime
recipe.tconstruct.remove_modifier.no_mod: Tool does not have any removable modifiers
recipe.tconstruct.part_swapping.too_many: Table is too small to swap parts on this tool
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.not_enough_sl: Need at least 1 %s slot to add this modifier
Need at least %s %s slots to add this modifier
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.validate_slot: This change leaves the tool with too few %s slots
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.requirements_: Tool state invalid for one of the modifiers. Contact your modpack maker and request a more descriptive error.
gui.tconstruct.caption: Caption
gui.tconstruct.general.hover: Hover over the entries for more information
gui.tconstruct.error.invalid_pattern: Pattern does not contain a valid tool part!
gui.tconstruct.error.useless_tool_part:
This part can not be used to craft any tool!

Either the material %s is missing some information or no tool uses a(n) %s in its crafting.
gui.tconstruct.error.not_enough_durabili:
Not enough durability to replace parts!
%d more durability required.
book.tconstruct.material.cast_from: Можно отлить из %s в формах для отливки
jei.tconstruct.casting.cast_kept: Отлитый предмет можно повторно использовать в других рецептах

jei.tconstruct.melting.ore: Recipe output is boosted based on the controller type

jei.tconstruct.entity_melting.title: Переплавка существ
jei.tconstruct.alloy.title: Смешивание
jei.tconstruct.modifiers.title: Modifiers
jei.tconstruct.modifiers.free: No modifier slots are required to apply
jei.tconstruct.modifiers.incremental: Recipe is incremental, you can apply part of the input for a partial effect
jei.tconstruct.severing.title: Отрезание

advancements.tconstruct.tools.materials_: Craft Materials and You, the introduction book into Tinkers' Construct

Create your first tool part using a pattern and some material in the part builder

advancements.tconstruct.tools.upgrade_sl: Give a tool 6 more upgrade slots using writable, recapitated, harmonious, resurrected, and gilded
advancements.tconstruct.tools.glass_cann: Create a tool that does over 20 damage with at most 100 durability
advancements.tconstruct.tools.tool_smith: Create one of every default small tool

Make a basic melting setup with a melter, a heater or tank, a casting basin, a casting table, and a faucet

advancements.tconstruct.smeltery.gold_ca: Make a reusable casts out of gold
advancements.tconstruct.smeltery.cast_co: Collect one of each gold cast
advancements.tconstruct.smeltery.mighty_: Craft the guidebook into the smeltery, mighty smelting

advancements.tconstruct.smeltery.tinkers: Craft a Tinker's Anvil using alloys from the smeltery!
advancements.tconstruct.smeltery.tool_fo: Forge one of every broad tool in the anvil
advancements.tconstruct.smeltery.abiliti: Apply every single default ability modifier to a tool at least once

Create a basic alloying setup using an alloyer, a fuel tank, some ingot tanks, a casting table, a casting basin, and a faucet

advancements.tconstruct.foundry.blaze.de: Fill a tank with blazing blood

advancements.tconstruct.foundry.encyclop: Craft the encyclopedia of materials with your knowledge from all the books

advancements.tconstruct.world.earth_isla: Locate an earthslime island in the ocean
advancements.tconstruct.world.sky_island: Locate an skyslime island in the sky
advancements.tconstruct.world.blood_isla: Locate an blood island in the nether lava ocean
advancements.tconstruct.world.ender_isla: Locate an enderslime island in the end outer islands
advancements.tconstruct.world.clay_islan: Locate a clay island in the sky
advancements.tconstruct.world.slime_slin: Sufficiently use each of the 4 slime sling types
advancements.tconstruct.world.piggybackp: Pick up a pig with a piggybackpack
